s2.name: JORAM source and binary packages

ul.li: kjoram-4.0.0.tgz, including kJORAM client libraries and kJORAM sample sources;
kjoram-4.0.0-src.tgz, including kJORAM client sources and kJORAM sample sources.

s2.p:
The download area is at
ObjectWeb Forge.

s2.name: JORAM CVS code base
s2.p: JORAM and kJORAM are available by checking out the joram module from CVS.
The latest release tag is joram4_0_1.
